Package com.mongodb.rx.client

This packages contains classes for the rx client implementation

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AggregateObservable<TResult>
    Observable for aggregate.
    DistinctObservable<TResult>
    Iterable for distinct.
    FindObservable<TResult>
    MongoObservable interface for find.
    ListCollectionsObservable<TResult>
    MongoObservable interface for ListCollections.
    ListDatabasesObservable<TResult>
    MongoObservable interface for ListDatabases.
    ListIndexesObservable<TResult>
    MongoObservable interface for ListIndexes.
    MapReduceObservable<TResult>
    Observable for map reduce.
    MongoClient
    A client-side representation of a MongoDB cluster.
    MongoCollection<TDocument>
    The MongoCollection interface.
    MongoDatabase
    The MongoDatabase interface.
    MongoObservable<TResult>
    Operations that can produce an Observable to iterate over the results with.
    ObservableAdapter
    An Observable Adapter that will apply an adaption to all Observables returned by the driver.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MongoClients
    A factory for MongoClient instances.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Success
    An enum representing a successful operation.

Package com.mongodb.rx.client Description

This packages contains classes for the rx client implementation
